docs.text: SMLE – Simple Machine Learning Enviroment Installation pip install smle pip install smle[torch] or visit torch site Create a new enviroment smle init
docs.title: Home

docs.text: pip install smle pip install smle[torch] or visit torch site
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: How to contribute to SMLE? MkDocs commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Update the library to PyPi Run bash publish.sh to publish the updated version of the library to PyPi. Attention! Remember to update the version in the pyproject.toml file
docs.title: Contribute
